post_message: Fuller House, the spin-off of the classic ABC sitcom Full House, finally hit Netflix this past Friday and the reviews are in. With all apologies to John Stamos, there are a lot of critics out there that simply have no mercy for this nostalgic reboot (okay, that was a really bad pun). Fuller House picks up 21 years after Full House, which left television screens in 1995 after eight seasons on ABC.
